business.yearsInBusiness: Established in 2010 and trusted for museum-quality reporting.
business.pricing: Desktop valuations start at $95 per item; onsite work billed hourly.

content.about: Blue Box Auction Gallery provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Antique Furniture, Vintage Collectibles. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Norfolk area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Karen M.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Michael W.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: David J.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: Karen W.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Blue Box Auction Gallery delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

business.pricing: Museum-grade reports from $325; collection reviews offered with custom estimates.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Norfolk provides professional antique appraisal services in the Norfolk area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Sarah R.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Nancy R.
reviews.content: Heritage Valuations Norfolk's knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: James W.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Emily J.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

business.pricing: Museum-grade reports from $325; collection reviews offered with custom estimates.
